static void logCurrentStatus(Context context, java.lang.String extension)
          Log the current process of NER and disambiguation into a log file.
For each level of identification (Recognized, Identified, Unidentified), prints a list of all genes and current candidate IDs, if any, per PubMed ID, together with the recognized gene name and its position.

LOGFILEBASENAME

TEXT_BY_TEXT

public static boolean TEXT_BY_TEXT
Process the input text-by-text (load a single text, run the pipeline; set to true) or all-at-once (false). Default: false. Switch in properties.xml:

TEXT_FILELIST

public static java.lang.String[] TEXT_FILELIST
For the TEXT_BY_TEXT option, a list of all files is stored at startup time. The pipeline is run text-by-text, TEXT_FILEPOINTER keeping track of the current file (#element in list).

TEXT_FILEPOINTER

public static int TEXT_FILEPOINTER
See TEXT_FILELIST.

logCurrentStatus

public static void logCurrentStatus(Context context,
                                    java.lang.String extension)
Log the current process of NER and disambiguation into a log file.
For each level of identification (Recognized, Identified, Unidentified), prints a list of all genes and current candidate IDs, if any, per PubMed ID, together with the recognized gene name and its position.

Parameters:
context -

runFilter

public static void runFilter(java.lang.String filter)
Calls the filter specified by filter and lets it filter the globalContext.

Parameters:
filter -

runAllFilters

public static void runAllFilters(java.lang.String[] pipeline)
Applies all filters in pipeline to the globalContext, in the order in which they are stored in pipeline.

Parameters:
pipeline -

runPipeline

public static void runPipeline()
Runs the pipeline in the order specified in the properties file (entry key "pipelineOrder"). Each filter will run on the globalContext and filters may need the textRepository and geneRepository.

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Command line interface.
